extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected FortiNAC Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the FortiNAC system is running a vulnerable version by checking the installed version number.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade FortiNAC to Version 9.4.3 or above
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade the FortiNAC system to version 9.4.3 or a later version to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade FortiNAC to Version 9.2.8 or above
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade the FortiNAC system to version 9.2.8 or a later version to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade FortiNAC to Version 9.1.10 or above
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade the FortiNAC system to version 9.1.10 or a later version to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade FortiNAC to Version 7.2.2 or above
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade the FortiNAC system to version 7.2.2 or a later version to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade FortiNAC to the latest available version
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade the FortiNAC system to the latest available version to ensure all vulnerabilities are mitigated.
